main event: Crew members of 2-94 had a visual sighting of an unidentified flying object in Kaesung, Korea on 11 June 1952.
interesting points: The object was observed to be hovering at an altitude of approximately 30,000 feet.,The object was circular in shape, silver in color, and approximately 40-50 feet in diameter.,It remained stationary for about 30 minutes before accelerating rapidly out of sight.,The crew members expressed amazement at the object's climbing ability and brilliance.,The officers believed the object was under intelligent control and utilized some unknown form of propulsion.
